# Anova em blocos

### Importação conjunto de dados


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_0814333dace7d9ceb8e9031aae3b3f9b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(gsheet)

soja <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=866852711")
```
:::


Para considerar o bloco como um fator devemos utilizar a função `mutate()`.


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_a871c314d37c5516bfb096c599852d0f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
soja <- soja %>% 
  mutate(TRAT = as.factor(TRAT),
         BLOCO = as.factor(BLOCO))
```
:::


### Visualização inicial


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_f363eb7cbb36466fb75f63639418ac7a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(Hmisc)

dfc <- soja %>%
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, DFC)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

fer <- soja %>% 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, FER))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

prod <- soja %>% 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, PROD))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

library(patchwork)
# juntar os gráficos
(dfc | fer | prod)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Anova variável DFC

No execução da ANOVA devemos considerar o bloco como elemento da análise "+ BLOCO".


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_46818ebeb75328e17ee55d2366b8ba84'}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_dfc <- lm(DFC ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)

anova(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: DFC
          Df  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 149.299 21.3284 51.5490 8.218e-12 ***
BLOCO      3   0.461  0.1537  0.3716    0.7743    
Residuals 21   8.689  0.4138                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# o bloco não tem efeito, mas deve ser levado em considração
```
:::


#### Verificação das premissas e discriminação dos grupos


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_5cf642631fadedaedcfc41ffbdce0d28'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)

check_normality(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.978).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.532).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(emmeans)
medias_dfc <- emmeans(aov_dfc, ~ TRAT) 

medias_dfc
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 TRAT emmean    SE df lower.CL upper.CL
 1     10.88 0.322 21    10.21    11.54
 2      6.42 0.322 21     5.76     7.09
 3      6.05 0.322 21     5.38     6.72
 4      4.75 0.322 21     4.08     5.42
 5      4.20 0.322 21     3.53     4.87
 6      4.00 0.322 21     3.33     4.67
 7      4.08 0.322 21     3.41     4.74
 8      4.58 0.322 21     3.91     5.24

Results are averaged over the levels of: BLOCO 
Confidence level used: 0.95 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
pwpm (medias_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
        1       2       3       4       5       6       7       8
1 [10.87]  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001
2   4.450 [ 6.42]  0.9896  0.0249  0.0017  0.0006  0.0009  0.0107
3   4.825   0.375 [ 6.05]  0.1329  0.0107  0.0040  0.0058  0.0628
4   6.125   1.675   1.300 [ 4.75]  0.9202  0.7173  0.8072  0.9999
5   6.675   2.225   1.850   0.550 [ 4.20]  0.9998  1.0000  0.9896
6   6.875   2.425   2.050   0.750   0.200 [ 4.00]  1.0000  0.9020
7   6.800   2.350   1.975   0.675   0.125  -0.075 [ 4.07]  0.9499

Upper triangle: P values   adjust = "tukey"
Diagonal: [Estimates] (emmean)

```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(multcomp)
cld (medias_dfc,Letters = LETTERS)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::


### Anova variável FER


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_deba90fb572842258c9a049eba519aeb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_fer <- lm(FER ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)

anova(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: FER
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 978.87 139.838 55.1717 4.218e-12 ***
BLOCO      3   3.84   1.279  0.5045    0.6834    
Residuals 21  53.23   2.535                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::


#### Verificação das premissas e discriminação dos grupos


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_8a95a72895449ae43a7799098414cc6c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Non-normality of residuals detected (p = 0.008).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Heteroscedasticity (non-constant error variance) detected (p < .001).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(DHARMa)
plot(simulateResiduals(aov_fer))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(emmeans)
medias_fer <- emmeans(aov_fer, ~ TRAT) 

medias_fer
```


#### Transformação variável FER


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_56192eb0153b6761b5bbbc88dd60dff2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(MASS)
b <- boxcox(lm(soja$FER ~ 1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lambda <- b$x[which.max(b$y)]
lambda
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] -1.555556
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
soja$FER2 <- (soja$FER ^ lambda - 1 / lambda)

aov_fer2 <- lm(FER2 ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)

anova(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: FER2
          Df   Sum Sq   Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 0.100762 0.0143946 12.9020 2.436e-06 ***
BLOCO      3 0.014264 0.0047546  4.2616   0.01687 *  
Residuals 21 0.023429 0.0011157                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::


#### Verificação das premissas e discriminação dos grupos com os dados transformados


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_2888d83d46f82f430a582f3ded4a8d5d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.787).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.872).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(DHARMa)
plot(simulateResiduals(aov_fer2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}

medias_fer2 <- emmeans(aov_fer2, ~ TRAT)

```

### Anova variável produção


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_edd1d40be82fac51da3d52848363d551'}


```
          Df  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value  Pr(>F)

Residuals 21 3406431  162211                  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

#### Visualização produção


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_4a485a63ecc35df1a0d8a0123f645a41'}

```{.r .cell-code}
df_prod <- data.frame(medias_prod_grupo)

df_prod %>% 
ggplot(aes(TRAT, emmean)) +
  geom_point() +
  ylim(2000,6500) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(min = lower.CL,
                    max = upper.CL),
                width = 0.1) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 1.1, y = 4200,
           label = "A")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
knitr::kable(df_prod %>% dplyr::select(TRAT, emmean, .group))
```

### Importação de outro conjunto de dados


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_01b00f4905b265dc44a95b2e0935ab85'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)

curv <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=1807247585")
```
:::


### Sumarização e Visualização


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_4771e8b6f98d4af3e2c168585fe17b9f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
curv %>% 
  group_by(Irrigation) %>% 
  summarise(sev_mean = mean(severity),sev_med = median(severity), sd_mean = sd(severity))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  Irrigation sev_mean sev_med sd_mean
  <chr>         <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>
1 Drip          0.213   0.165   0.152
2 Furrow        0.22    0.175   0.159
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
curv %>% 
  group_by(day, Irrigation) %>% 
  summarise(sev_mean = mean(severity)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(day,sev_mean)) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_point(whith = 0.05) +
  geom_line() + 
  facet_wrap(~~Irrigation)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Cálculo da área abaixo da curva de progresso da doença (AUDPC)

A AUDPC é uma medida utilizada para quantificar e comparar o progresso de doenças em plantas ao longo do tempo. A curva do progresso da doença apresenta o tempo no eixo x e a variável de interesse no eixo y. Utilizamos o elemento `AUDPC()` na camada summarise.


::: {.cell hash='Aula8_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_055f1f054b07f7f1175e6938ca5341e0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(epifitter)
curv2 <- curv %>% 
  group_by(Irrigation, rep) %>% 
  summarise(aacpd = AUDPC(day, severity))


m_curv <- lm(aacpd ~ Irrigation + factor(rep),
          data = curv2)

library (agricolae)
cv.model(m_curv)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1.097572
```
:::
:::
